Function.Context: Q: Not sure about the meaning of raster A: Rastercharts are overly charts from commercial parties like DFS, ICAO, Pooleys, Airr Milion. They arn't needed to use EasyVFR 4, but some user prefer to have them since they are used to use those. Raster is the technique used to show the charts. The other technique is Vector chart. The diffrence is that when zooming into a raster chart you get to see the pixel, its an image. But when zooming into a vector chart the level of details increases. Im am not sure if there is even en propper translation possible.
Q: Should see that in context to understand A: Route Planing window -> Route Tools. Here is [Flight Briefing] listed.

Q: ? Import route from disk ? A: Route Planing window -> Route Tools. Here is [Local Device] listed. On Android and iOS this does nothing but on desktop you get a message hinting to the route improt folder EV4.
Q: import route from RR ? A: Yes.
Q: import route from....? autorouter ??? Don't know this A: not sure what this is
Q: import route from clipboard? A: not sure what this is
Q: toggle auto wind on/off for route ? A: Route Planing window -> Route Tools. Here is [Auto Wind] listed.
Q: End as in exit now, or this is the end of the fpl. A: Stop route as in, remove current route and start fresh. NOT releated to flight plan filing.
Q: To / from other instances of EasyVFR. A: Currently not in use. Please ignore.
Q: Compile or File FPL? A: Create a Flight Plan to fiel to ATC.
Only icon. Text is hidden form user.
Only icon. Text is hidden form user.
Q: define outline. A: Wehen there is a warning for an airspace its border gets highlited in yellow.
Q: define outline. A: Wehen there is a warning for an airspace its border gets highlited in yellow.
Q: what is "screen data fields? A: Info Fields are the in-app instruments that apread when in flight. So the track, course, GPS altitude, AGL etcetere.
Please, always write the company name as EasyVFR.
Q: My airplane ? My airplanes ? A: Single: Aircraft.
Q: Maintain or record ? A: My User Waypoints. Is both for adding as for editing user waypoints.
Q: with toggle you mean toggle ON/OFF or toggle should not appear? A: The function ID in coloumn B are not visiible on the screen. The LabelText are.

Function.Context: Q: what does XTK (Eric) A: XTK is the distance deviation of the planned route in NM (Tim)

Literal.Context: Q: VirtualRadar is it some kind of brand or is it a Virtual radar? A: It is indeed a prduct name. Not yet implemented in EasyVFR 4. With EasyVFR 3 you could share your position with friends on a special webpage, the VirtualRadar. For EasyVFR 4 this will probably come back aswell.

Literal.OriginalText: Please be aware background location updates can significantly drain your device battery.

IMPORTANT: Alfa testing shows background location updates do not work for all iOS devices. On some devices EasyVFR4 gets terminated after a few seconds, and activating EasyVFR4 initiates then a fresh start.

Literal.OriginalText: Multiple crashes right after startup have been detected. This could be cause by corruption in one of the datafiles. A possible solution could be to delete these, but that would mean you must download these again. Do you want to do that?
